Name: Fiko
Review Text: I really like the originality of their pistachio pizza. The only thing is that the dough was too dry for my liking, and the ingredients on the pizza were mostly cold. I don't know if it was similar in my previous visits or if this is the ‚Ä¶

Name: Fiko
Review Text: Most delicious place in Amsterdam. I liked the Pizza more as the one in Naples and the sweets were fantastic too. Service was seemingly annoyed by our request to change the table but still tried to act nice. Definitely worth a visit.

Name: Fiko
Review Text:
I put one star because otherwise we would not be able to post the review.

We ordered two lasagnas at 14:00, and they didn't bring them to us until 16:45, ‚Ä¶

Name: Fiko
Review Text: We had the margherita and the pistachio pizza. Highly recommend the pistachio pizza. For a side we had the bruschetta. And some dessert. ‚Ä¶

Name: Fiko
Review Text: They recommended me the place for good pizza. Went to have dinner. Loved the place. ‚Ä¶

Name: Fiko
Review Text: We went here for dinner, because the Italian colleague of my friend said they make good pizzas here. And I must say that I agree!! ‚Ä¶

Name: Fiko
Review Text: I had my first gluten free pizza and barely could tell the difference! The pistachio pizza was so so delicious! ===== I was so impressed I ordered delivery, turns out it's not as nice üò¢ which is totally understandable! I recommend visiting physically!

Name: Fiko
Review Text:
Awesome, good, authentic, delicious... I can't even describe how happy it makes me to go there for dinner whenever I feel homesick.
Both locations are just as great!

Name: Fiko
Review Text: Fantastic food and staff were excellent 5 stars !!

Name: Fiko
Review Text: By far the best pizza at fiko Amsterdam. Pistachio, burrata and cherry tomatoes on black dough. You really need to give it a try.

Name: Fiko
Review Text: You see only beautiful ladies in that place

Name: Fiko
Review Text: Definitely try the pizza with pistachio! After the first bite of the most delicious mozzarella you'll wish you'd ordered the large pizza instead of the combo, but how could you not want to try another pizza if the whole menu sounds amazing? ‚Ä¶

Name: Fiko
Review Text:
Nice location, and ingredients.
But a point on food. Having a sandwich with such a fresh Italian ingredients would deserve more than a cold bread dough and consequently a cold sandwich to eat. ‚Ä¶

Name: Fiko
Review Text: I ordered an ortolana and I received this pizza.... why?! Mushroom with pesto!!

Name: Fiko
Review Text: I visited this place because I read so many good reviews about it. However, I don‚Äôt share the opinion of the others: service was a bit pretentious/arrogant. Pizzas had good ingredientes but they were delivered cold; the gnocchi pasta was ok ‚Ä¶

Name: Fiko
Review Text:
Very small sized pizza for overrated price.
Not coming back.
Quality is ok, but in Amsterdam you eat the same level pizza for much less.

Name: Fiko
Review Text: First of all they downgraded the menu. They don‚Äôt put as much truffle on the pizza as they used to do. Second, the pizza was cold when they served it. When we made a complaint about it, the waitress looked at us weird and made a weird comment that it seemed like we were lying. Would not recommend this place anymore.

Name: Fiko
Review Text: Great selection of pizza. You can tell that they use fresh and high quality products! Restaurant has a very cool vibe. We'll go back!

Name: Fiko
Review Text: Overhyped and overpriced place. The idea of adding fresh ingredients after baking your pizza is nice, but not if the result is serving them cold. Selling Nespresso as an espresso is an insult.

Name: Fiko
Review Text: Gluten free pizzas are top notch

Name: Fiko
Review Text: Unfortunately that was a complete disappointment when ordering via Deliveroo. The tartufiko lasagne was undercooked in the middle and cold, while the cheese on top was burned. The portion was very small even though it costed 22‚Ç¨. The ‚Ä¶

Name: Fiko
Review Text: Great vibe, outstanding service and amaaaaazing pizza

Name: Fiko
Review Text: Pizzas were great but they have an inexplicable rule of only letting you order in groups of 2 pizzas. Wanted to order 3 but they wouldn‚Äôt let us. Left a bit hungry, as we didn‚Äôt want 4!

Name: Fiko
Review Text: Good pizza! The place is a bit on the smaller side and tables aren't that comfortable. Normally I order my pizza to take away.

Name: Fiko
Review Text:
This restaurant made a mistake on one of our pizzas (wrong one delivered...)
Preparation was very long (more than one hour when it said 30min)
Pizzas arrived cold. Taste was disappointing

Name: Fiko
Review Text: Average pizza, overpriced for such poor quality. Also it already came cold at our table and when we complained, nothing has been done about it.

Name: Fiko
Review Text: Fantastic choice of pizzas, all absolutely delicious. Service friendly and unintrusive. A great find. We will be back.

Name: Fiko
Review Text: good pizza, unfortunate to not get the drinks i ordered on ubereats. i know i can get a refund, but doesnt change the fact i had to eat thirsty. still, one of the best pizzas ive had in amsterdam

Name: Fiko
Review Text: Excellent high end pizza's and anti pasti! Quality and Quality!!

Name: Fiko
Review Text: Great pizza with smart concept of double pizzas plates. Very nice location in de Pijp, but a bit small so make sure to reserve your table.

Name: Fiko
Review Text: Good, nothing spectacular a bit pricey. The nutella dessert has way to much nutella, making it difficult to eat and at some point you can't continue eating.

Name: Fiko
Review Text: Great place, amazing food and super friendly staff!

Name: Fiko
Review Text: Great taste and great vibe!

Name: Fiko
Review Text: Terrible inhumane place! I came here to pick up an online ordered pizza, and they did not only tell me to just wait outside but also refused me to use their toilet. For sure this was the first and last time I visit this restaurant!!

Name: Fiko
Review Text: Top pizza bar! Italian design and really nice music! Amazing food!

Name: Fiko
Review Text: The pizza, drinks, and atmosphere were excellent! Staff were friendly and kind.

Name: Fiko
Review Text: Very nice place, small but romantic. I had pizza with truffle and mushroom and it was amazing!

Name: Fiko

Name: Fiko

Name: Fiko

Name: Fiko
Review Text: Had a rez. at 20:30 and was there on time. Only at 20:45 we were told our table would be ready in another 15 minutes. When you are 15 minutes late, they cancel your rez. but apparently they can make you wait half an hour :)

Name: Fiko
